alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Noble (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:26PM EST until February 20 at 11:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. Saint Marys River at St. Mary`s River near Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio...Michigan... Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County. Wabash River at Wabash affecting Cass IN, Miami and Wabash Counties. Ottawa River near Kalida affecting Putnam County. Auglaize River near Defiance affecting Defiance County. Maumee River near Defiance affecting Henry and Defiance Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Ohio...Michigan... Salamonie River below Warren affecting Wabash, Huntington, Blackford, Wells and Jay Counties. Wabash River near Bluffton IN affecting Wells County. Eel River at North Manchester affecting Cass IN, Miami, Wabash, Whitley and Kosciusko Counties. Auglaize River near Fort Jennings affecting Allen OH, Paulding and Putnam Counties. Blanchard River at Ottawa affecting Putnam County. Maumee River at Napoleon affecting Henry County. Maumee River at Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN and Paulding Counties. Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Noble and Elkhart Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. Kankakee River at Davis affecting Starke, La Porte and St. Joseph IN Counties. Yellow River at Plymouth affecting Marshall, Starke and St. Joseph IN Counties. Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier affecting Williams County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Allen IN, De Kalb and Defiance Counties. Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. .These river rises will shift ice within the river and could lead to ice jams. This forecast is based on unobstructed flow and does not factor additional rises associated with ice jams. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Elkhart River at Goshen. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, The river reaches flood stage. Goshen, Shanklin, and Rogers Park in Goshen begin to flood. Island, Studebaker, and American Parks in Elkhart begin to flood. At 8.0 feet, Some residential and commercial properties near SR 119 are affected by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 7.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
